JobFullDesc:
Job Overview
We’re a fully remote company of 100 people today and we are growing! We need a talented recruiter who’s worked in the start up space and has the experience and know-how to be a one person show! This role will handle the full cycle of recruitment from start to finish. The majority of our hiring is in the technical space but we are also growing in product, marketing and finance/administrative areas. This role will report directly to the VP of People and partner to build out solid, consistent, and inclusive recruiting processes, recruiting trainings, and handle the implementation of the tools and systems needed to set us up for hiring success! This role will be critical in identifying and hiring people who have the necessary technical skills to get the job done AND who genuinely reflect our company values.
 
What you’ll do

Staffing and recruitment – proactively source, screen, interview, and place qualified candidates. Heavy emphasis on tech hiring. This includes creating and posting jobs, pre-screening resumes, interviewing candidates, and partnering with hiring managers throughout the selection process
Systems - Participate in vetting and selection of best ATS option for Plex and lead the implementation and company-wide training on the new tool
Create a clear, consistent, inclusive and equitable recruiting process for the Plex team and one that ensures an exceptional candidate experience
Assist in creating and implement a strong DEI strategy for recruitment
Create and conduct various sets of training for hiring managers and teams including but not limited to interview training, job description creation, assessing candidates for value alignment, assessing candidates for EQ, communication skills, and self-starter abilities to ensure success in a remote company
Assist with building and/or administering new hire onboarding
Assist with building out other recruiting programs like employee referrals, interns, etc.
Partner with hiring managers to devise and execute on targeted search strategy
Display highly organized and effective time management skills
Present shortlisted candidates and provide detailed profile summaries
Creatively attract top talent in a timely and cost-effective manner using multiple sources to advertise and recruit
Conduct intake meetings with hiring managers to identify/clarify hiring specifications and competencies, document and confirm principal requirements to ensure accurate and detailed job descriptions, and develop action plans to maximize candidate sourcing
Compose, monitor, and maintain job postings on various job boards
Create, generate, and make job offers
Build strong relationships with hiring managers to ensure a smooth recruiting process
Coordinate and communicate interview schedules with candidates, including scheduling of interviews
Conduct candidate testing, reference checks, and background checks
Develop networking and referral base with various community, nationwide and global organizations, agencies, and schools to enhance our image, provide information about employment opportunities with Plex and to attract qualified candidates
Present to various groups in person and via video
Coordinate and manage any job fairs, recruiting fairs, and other events
Monitor effectiveness of recruitment efforts, conduct turnover analysis, and provide detailed reports to track progress and analyze trends
Be a driven individual contributor AND contribute to the success of the team as a whole
Other projects/duties as assigned

 
What you bring to the table

Minimum 5-7 years full-cycle recruiting experience in both corporate and start up environments
Minimum 5-7 years experience in recruiting and sourcing for technical roles
You have helped build and set up a recruiting infrastructure
You have proven experience recruiting passive candidates utilizing advanced sourcing methods
Bachelor’s degree in human resources or business related field; or equivalent combination of education and experience
Experience working with media or technology focused companies
Strong knowledge of basic employment law and HR practices
Experienced in social recruiting, behavioral based interviewing, pre-employment testing, and other innovative selection methods
Experienced with creating and delivering trainings and presentations
Able to assess staffing needs and develop creative and effective recruiting strategies to meet those needs
Insightful – ability to assess intangible aspects of candidates accurately (candidate’s fit with the job and with the company culture); intuitive and able to read people well
Able to work in a fast-paced environment and work with all levels
Outgoing and very creative
Detail oriented, able to prioritize efficiently, and multitask while working with a distributed team across the globe
Proficient on ATS systems, Slack, and G suite/Google Workspace products
Be organized, self-directed, and take initiative with a strong sense of urgency
Able to maintain confidential information
Able to plan ahead and identify potential future problems
Must have solid interpersonal skills (written and verbal)
Passionate about being kind, humble, and helpful
Clear desire to make work fun and enjoyable
You believe in asking for help and helping others when they ask, never throwing a problem over the wall
You are hungry to have an impact, continuously working to improve our product, process and push the team to be it’s best

 
Who we are
Plex is a global streaming media platform that gives millions of customers around the world the freedom to enjoy all the content they love in one simple, beautiful app. We’re on a mission to become the world’s largest and most active community for media lovers, where people help each other discover, curate, enjoy, and share all of their favorite content, every single day. Yes, that’s a really audacious vision, but we all believe we can get there.
 
What sets us apart

We are the largest independent streaming platform built by a global team of employees who are fanatically passionate about delivering the highest quality, most unified, and user-friendliest entertainment experience possible.
We have always been a distributed organization, with people making great things happen in nearly 20 different countries and 11 time zones.
While we are headquartered in the San Francisco Bay Area, the vast majority of our employees are 100% remote, with in-person off-sites to bring team members together a few times a year.
We are passionate about our mission and we work hard, while still providing flexibility around a schedule that works for you.
We love what we’re building and our user community is an integral part of our development process. We actively engage with customers to understand what is working, what they want more of, and how we can be better.
We are committed to improving the communities where we live and work with charitable contributions, partnerships, and service.

 
What we value

Kindness, humility, and helpfulness
Speed, creativity, and agility
Ownership
Healthy debate
Our remote culture
Giving back
Balance

 
Benefits

Monthly wellness stipend
Flexible paid time off
Paid parental leave
Hardware stipend
Flextime, work from anywhere
Comprehensive health insurance (medical/dental/vision) (US employees)
Stock options
401k (US employees)
Plex for the Planet community service opportunities
